entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Chéticamp

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over the Highlands. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
